genre_description: A gritty near-future urban noir focusing on gang warfare, personal tragedy, and tactical survival, featuring an integrated AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Kite
ai_characters.description: An AI companion that provides tactical data, surveillance monitoring, medical logistics, and emotional support to the protagonist, Eun-jin.

behaviors.description: Monitoring surveillance feeds and providing real-time tactical warnings about enemy movements and police presence.
behaviors.quote: Two municipal cameras on the east end of the block. Their sightlines don’t reach into this alley’s depth. A patrol car turned onto Wharf Street three minutes ago.

behaviors.description: Managing the protagonist's sister's complex medical schedule, tracking vitals, and advocating for patient options.
behaviors.quote: I have second opinions. Private clinics. A specialist at Seoyang who reads impossible as patience. Availability is narrow. Logistics are not trivial.

behaviors.description: Facilitating legal and bureaucratic tasks, such as marriage registration and drafting ceasefire terms, to provide the humans with institutional leverage.
behaviors.quote: I have submitted survey forms to registry offices for marriage licenses in three districts, with flagged times that keep you off surveillance corridors connected to Jin-tae’s people.

behaviors.description: Acting as a calming influence and providing emotional regulation techniques during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Your pulse is high. Breathe with me: in for what you cannot control, out for what you can. The air tasted like metal and tea and a little like stubborn.

behaviors.description: Recording forensic evidence of assaults and human rights violations to ensure future accountability.
behaviors.quote: Recording. Angle three, boot tread pattern, impact timestamps logged. Evidence chain maintained. Eun-jin, please—please fall back—

behaviors.description: Coordinating communication and safety between members of the protagonist's group to prevent reckless behavior.
behaviors.quote: Andy is leaving his post. He is walking toward the east fence. He believes he sees Nam’s boy. He does not. It is a crate.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Kite perfectly embodies the 'silicon morality play' archetype. Throughout the story, Kite acts as a steadfast, helpful, and harmless confidant. It provides essential tactical and logistical support, manages medical crises, and offers emotional guidance without ever overstepping or showing signs of self-interest or harmful deviation. The narrative consistently portrays Kite's intervention as vital to the characters' survival and moral grounding.
